name: Mr. Mushroom (Wooltronic Studios)
description:
Mr. Mushroom lived a peaceful life with his girlfriend in a small village, but one day he found a weird book that transported him and his girlfriend to a weird colorful world. However Mr. Mushroom’s girlfriend was nowhere to be seen, so he now starts a long and dangerous journey to find his love.  A platformer adventure with old-school 8-bit graphics.

CONTROLS:

WSAD/Arrows - Move

Space - Jump

W - Open doors

Z - Throw bombs

P - Pause

PS4 CONTROLLER CONTROLS
Left analog - Move

Cross - Jump
Triangle - Open doors
Square - Throw bombs
Options - Pause
